channel.title: Db
channel.description:
What would this be caused from?
Error
SQL query:
-- -- Database: `rscd` -- -- -------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Table structure for table `bans` -- CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bans` ( `id` int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `username` varchar( 200 ) default NULL , `ip` varchar( 255 ) default NULL , `email` varchar( 50 ) default NULL , `message` varchar( 255 ) default NULL , `expire` int( 10 ) unsigned default NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT =1;
MySQL said: Documentation
#1046 - No database selected
I threw out my old database to start over and I got this?

item.description:
@anc13nts1 wrote:

What do I need to explain go into your wamp click on databases, create a database named rscd then go to the rscd database and click import then make the db (the file with all stuff in it) rscd.sql then import that

item.title: Db
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Meth Sir Meth
item.description:
@Sir_Meth wrote:

What would this be caused from?

Error

SQL query:

–
– Database: rscd

–
– Table structure for table bans

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bans (
id int( 10 ) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT ,
username varchar( 200 ) default NULL ,
ip varchar( 255 ) default NULL ,
email varchar( 50 ) default NULL ,
message varchar( 255 ) default NULL ,
expire int( 10 ) unsigned default NULL ,
PRIMARY KEY ( id )
) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT =1;

MySQL said: Documentation

#1046 - No database selected

I threw out my old database to start over and I got this?

Read full topic
